nodes.text: An iced Trammistan chocolate donut was a type of donut. It was iced with Trammistan chocolate and was served at the restaurant Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. There, the donuts were made in a traditional Adarian style by a genuine Crisp-E-O donut droid every morning. They cost 1.5 credits. According to the diner's owner, Dexter Jettster, the iced Trammistan chocolate donuts were a crowd-pleasing favorite.

Iced Trammistan chocolate donuts were mentioned in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article which was written by Gregory Walker and formatted as an in-universe menu. Walker included a reference to "Adarian-stlye donuts" due to his fondness for abandoned concepts, as Adarians were created for the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi but were cut from the final movie.
